cause.description:
Also known as eczema, is a condition on the skin which causes rash and extreme itching. The heat and warm weather worsen this condition. Also extreme cold. It is not well know what causes it but it is most of the times related to intestinal conditions, and also stress. The seriousness of this condition is the itchiness which causes the patient to scratch their skin so hard it can cause bleeding which can develop serious infections in the skin.
1. There should be more investigation for this condition.
2. A cure can be found.
cause.mission: Find a cure for this dermatological condition
